Export.zv: Cache for UNIX (Red Hat Enterprise Linux for x86-64) 2014.1.3 (Build 775)

Method.name: OnPageBODY
Method.Implementation:
Write "" Write !,"" Do ..WriteTitlePane("@Ensemble:ASTMManagerSegmentStructure@Ensemble ASTM Segment Structure") Write !,"
" Write !,!,"
" Write "ASTM Segment Structure definition is displayed below:" Write "
" Write !,! #include EnsEDIASTM set ss=%request.Get("SS") set category=$p(ss,":",2) set secondary=$p(ss,":",3) If ((category'="")&&(secondary'="")) { set description=..EscapeHTML($get($$$vaSchemaDescGbl(category,"SS",secondary))) if '$data($$$vaSchemaGbl(category,"SS",secondary)) { write ""_ss_" Definition does not exist!",! quit } } set ds=%request.Get("DS") set tPath=%request.Get("PATH") Write ! If '($L(tPath)) Goto %csp00001 ;{ Write !,"
" Write "Path you followed to get to this segment: "_(tPath)_"
",! Write " In Document Structure  '"_($P(ds,":",2,3))_"'" Write "
" Write ! %csp00001 ;} Write !,"
" Write !,!,"",! Write !,"",! Write !,"",! Write !,"",! Write ! #include EnsEDIASTM If ((category'="")&&(secondary'="")) { set struct=$$$vaSchemaGbl(category,"SS",secondary) kill names set name="" for { set name=$o($$$vaSchemaGbl(category,"SS",secondary,"names",name)) quit:name="" set names($$$vaSchemaGbl(category,"SS",secondary,"names",name))=name } for i=1:1:$LL(struct) { set one=$li(struct,i) write "" write "" ; description set description=..EscapeHTML($get($$$vaSchemaDescGbl(category,"SS",secondary,i))) write "" ; property name set tPropPath=$S(""=$get(names(i)):"",1:tPath_":"_$get(names(i)))_$S($li(one,6):"()",1:"") write "" ; component structure set value=$li(one,1) write "" ; symbol set value=$li(one,2),annotate=$case(value,"*":"zero or more", "+":"one or more", "!":"exactly one required", "?":"conditional", "&":"conditional", :"") write "" ; repeat count set value=$li(one,3) write "" ; length set value=$li(one,4) write "" ; required set value=$li(one,5) write "" ; if repeating set value=$li(one,6) write "" ; code table set value=$g($$$vaSchemaGbl(category,"SS",secondary,"tables",i)) write "" ; alternate description set altdesc=..EscapeHTML($get($$$vaSchemaDescGbl(category,"SS",secondary,i,"alt"))) write "" } } Write !,"
"_(category_":"_secondary)_" "_($G(description))_"
FieldDescriptionProperty NameData StructureSymbolRepeat CountLengthRequiredRepeatingCode Table
Alternate
Description
"_i_"",$s(description="":" ",1:description),""_$get(names(i)," ")_"",$s(value="":" ",1:""_value_""),"",$s(value="":" ",1:value_$s(annotate="":"",1:" ("_annotate_")")),"",$s(value="":" ",1:value),"",$s(value="":" ",1:value),"",$s(value="":" ",1:value),"",$s(value="":" ",1:value),"",$s(value="":" ",1:""_value_""),"",$s(altdesc="":" ",1:altdesc),"
",! Write !,"

",! Write "" Write "(Show All Categories)" Write "" Write "
",! Write "" Write "(Show All Segment Structures in Category '"_(category)_"')" Write "" Write !,"

" Write !,""

Method.name: OnPageHEAD
Method.Implementation: Write "<head>" Write !,"<title>Ensemble ASTM Segment Structure</title>",! Write "<link rel=""stylesheet"" type=""text/css"" href=""/csp/sys/csputils.css"" title=""Standard Style""/>" Write !,"</head>"

Method.name: OnPageHTML
Method.Implementation: Write "<html>" Write ! Do ..OnPageHEAD() Write ! Do ..OnPageBODY() Write !,"</html>"
